mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BEAUTY_INFO ( BEAUTY_SEQ_NO, TITLE, BEAUTY_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( BEAUTY_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{beautyContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO ( FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO, USER_NO, ORI_NAME, CHG_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, EXTENSION, REG_DT, BRD_KIND ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(BEAUTY_SEQ_NO) FROM BEAUTY_INFO), #{userNo}, #{oriName}, #{chgName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{extension}, SYSDATE, #{brdKind} )
mapper.select: SELECT BI.BEAUTY_SEQ_NO as beautySeqNo, BI.TITLE as title, BI.BEAUTY_CONTENTS as beautyContents, BI.REG_DT as regDt, BI.CHG_DT as chgDt, BI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM BEAUTY_INFO BI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT BI.BEAUTY_SEQ_NO as beautySeqNo, BI.TITLE as title, BI.BEAUTY_CONTENTS as beautyContents, BI.REG_DT as regDt, BI.CHG_DT as chgDt, BI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM BEAUTY_INFO BI, FILE_INFO FI, USER_INFO UI WHERE BI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND BI.BEAUTY_SEQ_NO = #{beautySeqNo} AND BI.BEAUTY_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO AND FI.BRD_KIND = 'beauty'

SELECT BI.BEAUTY_SEQ_NO as beautySeqNo, BI.TITLE as title, BI.BEAUTY_CONTENTS as beautyContents, BI.REG_DT as regDt, BI.CHG_DT as chgDt, BI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM BEAUTY_INFO BI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE BI.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_INFO SET CHG_NAME = #{chgName}, ORI_NAME = #{oriName}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, EXTENSION = #{extension} WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
